data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Tyler Cline's Cinematic Fantasy Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Tyler Cline’s Cinematic Fantasy Music Pack introduces the sounds of an orchestrated score. It’s cinematic and fantasy-based inspiration contains peaceful and mellow moments and tracks of more intensity and emotion for scenarios that call for a greater impact. Will this be the cinematic quality soundtrack you are looking for in your next RPG?

Features:

* 13 songs in MP3, M4A, OGG and WAV formats
* Royalty-free music for use in games!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* NOT OK for use in games with gore
* NOT OK for use in adult-rated games

data.short_description: Tyler Cline’s Cinematic Fantasy Music Pack introduces the sounds of an orchestrated score, perfect for any game setting!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
